Bovine serum albumin (BSA) is a globular protein (~66,000 Da) that is used in numerous biochemical applications due to its stability and lack of interference within biological reactions. Sigma provides a variety of Bovine serum albumins with purities ranging from 95-99%. Sigma-Aldrich manufactures and distributes bovine serum albumins purified from a variety of primary methods including the true Cohn fractionation method, modified ethanol fractionation methods, heat shock and chromatography.
